channel.title: I need help to know where to put it this simple code
channel.description:
Add thses to the things you dont want massed on:
Code: [sub] If (actionTimer == 0) {[/sub]
Runs the code if timer = to 0
Code:
[sub]actionTimer = TIME;[/sub]
Sets the count down time.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 08:38:04 PM[/size][hr]Where do i place those codes, It's a code to disable the mass clicking on my project 16 v.6 server, if it's for testscape only or pimpscape, post it anyways please. Thanks for your help :)

item.title: I need help to know where to put it this simple code
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Add thses to the things you dont want massed on:

Code:
[sub]
If (actionTimer == 0) {[/sub]

Runs the code if timer = to 0

Code:

[sub]actionTimer = TIME;[/sub]

Sets the count down time.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 08:38:04 PM[/size][hr]Where do i place those codes, It’s a code to disable the mass clicking on my project 16 v.6 server, if it’s for testscape only or pimpscape, post it anyways please. Thanks for your help
